info.name: DataServiceAPI
info.description: version=1.0 - Mock examples for DataServiceAPI GraphQL service

body.raw: {"query":"query dsModel($model: String!) { dsModel(model: $model) { name defaultVersion } }","variables":{"model":"demo-model"}}
{"query":"query dsModel($model: String!) { dsModel(model: $model) { name defaultVersion } }","variables":{"model":"demo-model"}}
{"query":"query trendingChannels($topN: Int!) { trendingChannels(topN: $topN) { tagV2 { hash uuid type } rank } }","variables":{"topN":1}}
{"query":"query trendingChannels($topN: Int!) { trendingChannels(topN: $topN) { tagV2 { hash uuid type } rank } }","variables":{"topN":1}}

{"query":"query trendingArticles($topN: Int!, $primaryPrioritizedTag: String, $secondaryPrioritizedTags: [String!]!) { trendingArticles(topN: $topN, primaryPrioritizedTag: $primaryPrioritizedTag, secondaryPrioritizedTags: $secondaryPrioritizedTags) { type contentID rank } }","variables":{"topN":1,"primaryPrioritizedTag":"demo-primaryPrioritizedTag","secondaryPrioritizedTags":"demo-secondaryPrioritizedTags"}}

{"query":"query trendingArticles($topN: Int!, $primaryPrioritizedTag: String, $secondaryPrioritizedTags: [String!]!) { trendingArticles(topN: $topN, primaryPrioritizedTag: $primaryPrioritizedTag, secondaryPrioritizedTags: $secondaryPrioritizedTags) { type contentID rank } }","variables":{"topN":1,"primaryPrioritizedTag":"demo-primaryPrioritizedTag","secondaryPrioritizedTags":"demo-secondaryPrioritizedTags"}}

{"query":"query trendingVideos($topN: Int!, $countryCode: String, $aspectRatio: AspectRatio, $primaryPrioritizedTag: String, $secondaryPrioritizedTags: [String!]!) { trendingVideos(topN: $topN, countryCode: $countryCode, aspectRatio: $aspectRatio, primaryPrioritizedTag: $primaryPrioritizedTag, secondaryPrioritizedTags: $secondaryPrioritizedTags) { type contentID rank } }","variables":{"topN":1,"countryCode":"demo-countryCode","aspectRatio":{},"primaryPrioritizedTag":"demo-primaryPrioritizedTag","secondaryPrioritizedTags":"demo-secondaryPrioritizedTags"}}

{"query":"query trendingVideos($topN: Int!, $countryCode: String, $aspectRatio: AspectRatio, $primaryPrioritizedTag: String, $secondaryPrioritizedTags: [String!]!) { trendingVideos(topN: $topN, countryCode: $countryCode, aspectRatio: $aspectRatio, primaryPrioritizedTag: $primaryPrioritizedTag, secondaryPrioritizedTags: $secondaryPrioritizedTags) { type contentID rank } }","variables":{"topN":1,"countryCode":"demo-countryCode","aspectRatio":{},"primaryPrioritizedTag":"demo-primaryPrioritizedTag","secondaryPrioritizedTags":"demo-secondaryPrioritizedTags"}}

{"query":"query a2v($articleUuid: String!, $countryCode: String, $version: Int, $aspectRatio: AspectRatio, $limit: Int, $primaryPrioritizedTag: String, $secondaryPrioritizedTags: [String!]!) { a2v(articleUuid: $articleUuid, countryCode: $countryCode, version: $version, aspectRatio: $aspectRatio, limit: $limit, primaryPrioritizedTag: $primaryPrioritizedTag, secondaryPrioritizedTags: $secondaryPrioritizedTags) { type contentID score } }","variables":{"articleUuid":"id-12345","countryCode":"demo-countryCode","version":1,"aspectRatio":{},"limit":10,"primaryPrioritizedTag":"demo-primaryPrioritizedTag","secondaryPrioritizedTags":"demo-secondaryPrioritizedTags"}}

{"query":"query articleBlocklist($sinceDate: Date, $beforeDate: Date, $limit: Int) { articleBlocklist(sinceDate: $sinceDate, beforeDate: $beforeDate, limit: $limit) { type contentID insertedAt } }","variables":{"sinceDate":"2026-02-20T10:00:00Z","beforeDate":"2026-02-20T10:00:00Z","limit":10}}

{"query":"query alertRanks($limit: Int, $offset: Int) { alertRanks(limit: $limit, offset: $offset) { rank pushNotification { id } } }","variables":{"limit":10,"offset":1}}
